name: CHESS QUEEN
description: Introducing Queen's Gambit (QNG), the premier digital token of the chess world, exclusively on the Solana blockchain. Inspired by the most powerful piece in chess, the Queen, this token encapsulates strategy, grace, and versatility. Queen's Gambit is designed to empower players, enthusiasts, and investors by providing a unique blend of utility and governance within the burgeoning ecosystem of blockchain-based gaming.
